aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: My name is Chad Feierstein, and technology is my great passion. From an early age, I've been fascinated by the art of mastering complex challenges through innovative digital solutions. This fascination motivates me daily to expand my knowledge and explore new horizons.

career.title: My Career
career.content: My professional background includes solid training as an IT technician and a higher degree (BTS) in Cloud Computing. This academic path, complemented by practical experience, has given me a comprehensive understanding of key IT areas.

passion.title: Passion for Technology
passion.content: My passion lies in web development and process automation. I enthusiastically develop customized web applications and implement efficient server solutions.

hobbies.title: Hobbies and Interests
hobbies.content: Away from the digital world, I enjoy valuable moments with my family, which includes our three furry companions. Regular meetings with friends and occasional gaming sessions provide the perfect balance to my technology-driven daily life.
